home.title: Better Starts Here
home.subtitle: "Better me, better world." At Beijing Academy, our talented students and dedicated faculty embark on a journey of discovery, growth, and excellence, transforming the world for the better every step of the way.
home.projects: Learn about how our students make a difference
home.introText: At BAID, you are empowered to explore your passions, build meaningful connections, and uncover new pathways to your full potential — every single day.

bento.mottoText: The motto that sits at the heart of everything we do at Beijing Academy
bento.outcome:
Continuing the legacy
Top university outcomes
bento.outcomeText: Students and graduates from Beijing Academy have been accepted to Harvard, Stanford, Imperial, McGill, HKU, University of Tokyo, and more.
bento.faculty:
World-class faculty
93% with graduate degrees
bento.countriesText: This year, BAID graduates will study in six countries/regions around the globe.
bento.academicsText: With over 20 AP courses and undergraduate-level courses, the MFP research program, project-based learning and more, BAID prepares students for success in college and beyond.
bento.life: Live the best years of your life

academics.restrictions: Courses subject to prerequisites and grade-level restrictions; refer to student guide for details.

admissions.comment: This page is applicable only to students joining BAID through the 中考 (zhongkao).
